IMPORT_WALLET.error: There was an issue reading the import data for your wallet.  Double check the address and try again.
IMPORT_WALLET.import: Almost finished - just enter your wallet password to decrypt your wallet!
IMPORT_WALLET.imported: Your wallet has been successfully imported!

IMPORT.import_text: If you already have a QLC Chain Account, you can import it below. When you import an account, none of your existing wallets or accounts are affected, and your seed is not stored anywhere besides in your local client. Use the drop down below to select which type of import you want to use.
IMPORT.seed_placeholder: Enter any QLC Chain Accountsâ€™s 64 character seed
IMPORT.file_text: If you have saved your account to a file, use the button below to import it.
IMPORT.ledger_install: Make sure you have the QLC app installed, then connect your ledger device via USB (Chrome/Opera only).
IMPORT.ledger_not_connected_desc: Connect your ledger device via USB and make sure you have the QLC Chain Wallet app installed, then press the button below to retry
IMPORT.ledger_locked_desc: Unlock your Ledger device, then press the button below to retry
IMPORT.ledger_ready_desc: Press the import button below to use your ledger wallet

CONFIGURE_WALLET.configure_wallet_warning:
You already have an account configured
Before going any further, be 100% certain you have backed up the seed to your current account!
Without it, any funds you have will become completely unrecoverable!
CONFIGURE_WALLET.configure_wallet_text: Choose an option below to configure your account

CREATE_NEW_WALLET.create_new_wallet_text1: When you create a new account, a new QLC Chain Account seed will be generated which can be used to create brand new wallets on the QLC Chain network. Your QLC Account seed is the master key to all of your wallets and any money inside of them!
CREATE_NEW_WALLET.create_new_wallet_text2: Make sure you back up your seed, write it down, and keep it incredibly safe!
CREATE_NEW_WALLET.create_new_wallet_text3: There is NO way to recover it after creation, and all funds inside WILL be lost without it!
CREATE_NEW_WALLET.create_new_wallet_agree: I agree and I understand everything

CREATE_NEW_CREATED.create_new_created_text: Your new QLC Chain Account has been created! Below is the mnemonic phrase and seed for your account, you can use whichever you prefer.
CREATE_NEW_CREATED.warning1: Make sure to write down your mnemonic phrase/seed or save it somewhere safe, and never share it with anyone!
CREATE_NEW_CREATED.warning2: It is the master key to all of your accounts, and the only way to recover your funds in an emergency.

SET_WALLET_PASSWORD.set_wallet_password_text: The last step is to set a new password for your wallet. Your password is used to encrypt the sensitive parts of your wallet when it is locked, which disables sending, receiving, creating accounts, and other operations.
SET_WALLET_PASSWORD.warning: If you lose your password, you can always restore your account and wallets using your seed.

WALLET_CONFIGURED.wallet_configured_text: Your account has been configured and you are ready to send and receive QLC Chain Tokens!
WALLET_CONFIGURED.warning: If you lose your password, you can always restore your account using your seed.
WALLET_CONFIGURED.warning_ledger: Press the Ledger status bar on the left side to reload your Ledger when connecting or disconnecting it.

WALLET_WARNINGS.msg3: You must set a password on your account - it is currently blank!

IMPORT_WALLET_WARNINGS.msg1: No import data found.  Check your link and try again.
IMPORT_WALLET_WARNINGS.msg2: Bad import data.  Check your link and try again.
IMPORT_WALLET_WARNINGS.msg3: Unable to decode import data.  Check your link and try again.

CONFIGURE_WALLET_WARNINGS.msg4: Seed is invalid, double check it!
CONFIGURE_WALLET_WARNINGS.msg5: Mnemonic is too short, double check it!
CONFIGURE_WALLET_WARNINGS.msg6: Mnemonic is invalid, double check it!
CONFIGURE_WALLET_WARNINGS.msg7: Unable to decode mnemonic, double check it!
CONFIGURE_WALLET_WARNINGS.msg12: No ledger device detected, make sure it is connected and you are using Chrome/Opera
CONFIGURE_WALLET_WARNINGS.msg13: Unlock your ledger device and open the QLC Chain wallet app to continue
CONFIGURE_WALLET_WARNINGS.msg15: Successfully created new wallet! Make sure to write down your seed!
CONFIGURE_WALLET_WARNINGS.msg16: Password confirmation does not match, try again!
CONFIGURE_WALLET_WARNINGS.msg21: Unable to parse import data, make sure you selected the right file!

SEND_WARNINGS.msg2: To account address is not valid
SEND_WARNINGS.msg3: From and to account are required
SEND_WARNINGS.msg5: From and to account cannot be the same
SEND_WARNINGS.msg7: Transactions for less than 1 qlc will be ignored by the node.  Send raw amounts with at least 1 qlc.
SEND_WARNINGS.msg8: From account does not have enough
SEND_WARNINGS.msg9: Unable to find sending account in wallet
SEND_WARNINGS.msg12: There was an error sending your transaction, please try again.
SEND_WARNINGS.msg13: There was an error sending your transaction:

ACCOUNTS_WARNINGS.msg3: You can only track up to 20 accounts at a time.
ACCOUNTS_WARNINGS.msg10: Confirming account address on Ledger device...
ACCOUNTS_WARNINGS.msg12: Account address denied - if it is wrong do not use the wallet!

MANAGE_WALLET.export_wallet_text:
Use this export tool to simplify account transfer to other devices. Your data will be encrypted by your password, and then imported into QLC Chain Account on your new device!

The export does not contain your address book.
MANAGE_WALLET.export_wallet_text2:
Scan the QR code on any device to load your QLC Chain Account!

If you do not have a QR code scanner, you can also import your account by using the URL below.
MANAGE_WALLET.import_address_book_text: Use this option to import your address book from a file.
MANAGE_WALLET.backup_wallet_text1: To access backup options, unlock your account.
MANAGE_WALLET.backup_wallet_text2: To backup your account mnemonic phrase,
MANAGE_WALLET.backup_wallet_text3: to copy it to your clipboard.
MANAGE_WALLET.export_address_book_text1:
Use this tool to simplify transferring your address book between devices. Use the options below to export your address book from a file or QR Code/URL.

Your address book is not encrypted by your account password.
MANAGE_WALLET.export_address_book_text2:
Scan the QR code on any device to load your QLC Chain Account!

If you do not have a QR code scanner, you can also import your account by using the URL below.
MANAGE_WALLET.export_address_book_copied: Address book export copied to clipboard!

MANAGE_WALLET_WARNINGS.msg7: Address books with 25 or more entries need to use the file export method.
MANAGE_WALLET_WARNINGS.msg10: Bad import data, make sure you selected a QLC Account Address Book export
MANAGE_WALLET_WARNINGS.msg11: Unable to parse import data, make sure you selected the right file!

CONFIGURE_APP_WARNINGS.msg20: Do Not Lock Account On Close
CONFIGURE_APP_WARNINGS.msg24:
Warning

You are about to delete all locally cached Proof of Work values

Are you sure?
CONFIGURE_APP_WARNINGS.msg26:
Warning

You are about to delete all of your account data!
Make sure you have your seed backed up!!

Are you sure?
CONFIGURE_APP_WARNINGS.msg28:
Warning

You are about to delete ALL of your data.
This includes all of your account data, your address book, and your application settings!

Make sure you have your seed backed up!!

Are you sure?
CONFIGURE_APP_WARNINGS.msg29: Successfully deleted ALL locally stored data!

REPRESENTATIVES.representatives_text: You have delegated voting weight to the following representatives
REPRESENTATIVES.status_alert: This is an official representative or it has very high (10%+) voting weight.  It is recommended to change to a new representative!
REPRESENTATIVES.status_warn: This representative has a high voting weight (1%+).  Consider changing to a new representative.
REPRESENTATIVES.status_trusted: This representative is marked as trusted.  No change is needed.
REPRESENTATIVES.status_known: This representative is saved in your list, as long as it is online, no change is needed.
REPRESENTATIVES.status_none: This representative is not known, consider switching to a known one or add this one to your list
REPRESENTATIVES.select_accounts: Select the accounts which are using this representative
REPRESENTATIVES.no_voting_delegate: None of your accounts have delegated any voting weight yet, you must receive a transaction to change your representative!
REPRESENTATIVES.select_all_acc_with_rep: Click on a representative to select all of the accounts delegated to it

REPRESENTATIVES_LIST.representatives_list_text: You can use the representatives list to store a label and other information for representatives you use.
REPRESENTATIVES_LIST.name: Name
REPRESENTATIVES_LIST.no_reps1: You do not have any representatives saved yet,
REPRESENTATIVES_LIST.trusted_check_tooltip: Make a representative appear at the top of your list as a recommended option
REPRESENTATIVES_LIST.avoid_check_tooltip: Warn the user when using this representative
